name:
Whitney Steele's New Album, "Beyond These Four Walls"


by
Whitney Steele
blurb: I am going ~"Beyond These Four Walls"~ and into the studio to record a brand new album!!!

rewards.desc: I will blow a kiss to wherever you are! :)
Digital download of entire album, "Beyond These Four Walls" + I will blow a kiss to wherever you are!

Autographed and personalized physical copy of the brand new album, "Beyond These Four Walls" + Your name in a special "Thank You" section of Whitney's website + I will blow a kiss to wherever you are!

Whitney Steele T-shirt (Design #2 of Limited Edition) -- ALSO -- Autographed and personalized physical copy of the brand new album, "Beyond These Four Walls" + Your name in a special "Thank You" section of Whitney's website + I will blow a kiss to wherever you are!

A personal phone call from Whitney to say THANK YOU! -- ALSO -- Whitney Steele T-shirt (Design #2 of Limited Edition) + Autographed and personalized physical copy of the brand new album, "Beyond These Four Walls" + Digital download of entire album + Your name in a special "Thank You" section of Whitney's website + I will blow a kiss to wherever you are!

LIVE Skype Call + Autographed VIP Photo -- ALSO -- A personal phone call from Whitney to say THANK YOU! + Whitney Steele T-shirt (Design #2 of Limited Edition) + Autographed and personalized physical copy of the brand new album, "Beyond These Four Walls" + Digital download of entire album + Your name in a special "Thank You" section of Whitney's website + I will blow a kiss to wherever you are!

*TOUR VIP* Handwritten lyrics of a song from the new album + An original or cover song recorded and posted on You Tube dedicated to you -- ALSO -- LIVE Skype Call + Autographed VIP Photo + A personal phone call from Whitney to say THANK YOU! + Whitney Steele T-shirt (Design #2 of Limited Edition) + Autographed and personalized physical copy of the brand new album, "Beyond These Four Walls" + Digital download of entire album + Your name in a special "Thank You" section of Whitney's website + I will blow a kiss to wherever you are!

*SILVER TOUR VIP* Special Lunch with Whitney Steele! -- ALSO -- Handwritten lyrics of a song from the new album + An original or cover song recorded and posted on You Tube dedicated to you + LIVE Skype Call + Autographed VIP Photo + A personal phone call from Whitney to say THANK YOU! + Whitney Steele T-shirt (Design #2 of Limited Edition) + Autographed and personalized physical copy of the brand new album, "Beyond These Four Walls" + Digital download of entire album + Your name in a special "Thank You" section of Whitney's website + I will blow a kiss to wherever you are! **Lunch paid for by person pledging.

*GOLD TOUR VIP* Private House Concert (Invite your closest friends to your house for a lovely evening...I will bring my acoustic guitar for an intimate night of story telling and music.) -- ALSO -- Special Lunch with Whitney Steele! + Handwritten lyrics of a song from the new album + An original or cover song recorded and posted on You Tube dedicated to you + LIVE Skype Call + Autographed VIP Photo + A personal phone call from Whitney to say THANK YOU! + Whitney Steele T-shirt (Design #2 of Limited Edition) + Autographed and personalized physical copy of the brand new album, "Beyond These Four Walls" + Digital download of entire album + Your name in a special "Thank You" section of Whitney's website + I will blow a kiss to wherever you are!   **Lunch paid for by person pledging. ***Travel expenses paid for by the person pledging if the concert is outside of California.

*PLATINUM TOUR* A day at Disneyland with Whitney Steele! -- ALSO -- Private House Concert (Invite your closest friends to your house for a lovely evening...I will bring my acoustic guitar for an intimate night of story telling and music.) + Special Lunch with Whitney Steele! + Handwritten lyrics of a song from the new album + An original or cover song recorded and posted on You Tube dedicated to you + LIVE Skype Call + Autographed VIP Photo + A personal phone call from Whitney to say THANK YOU! + Whitney Steele T-shirt (Design #2 of Limited Edition) + Autographed and personalized physical copy of the brand new album, "Beyond These Four Walls" + Digital download of entire album + Your name in a special "Thank You" section of Whitney's website + I will blow a kiss to wherever you are!  **Lunch paid for by person pledging. ***Travel expenses paid for by the person pledging if the concert is outside of Arizona. ****Disneyland paid for by the person pledging.

shirt.desc: Whitney Steele T-shirt (Design #2 of Limited Edition) -- ALSO -- Autographed and personalized physical copy of the brand new album, "Beyond These Four Walls" + Your name in a special "Thank You" section of Whitney's website + I will blow a kiss to wherever you are!

name:
Your Fuel Needed for the Ax Inferno


by
Paul Speer
blurb: The new album.  Tasty instrumental rock with a dash of electronica.

rewards.desc: A thank you on Paul's website and a virtual high five from Paul (all backers will receive a thank you on the website).
Download two cuts of your choice from the album and a virtual high five from Paul.
Hi resolution digital download of the album.
A limited edition Ax Inferno guitar pick + autographed CD + download.
THE INFERNO BONFIRE: Ax Inferno T-shirt + guitar pick + autographed CD + download.
CD of the Hells Canyon European release (out of print) with Scott Rockenfield of Queensryche + THE INFERNO BONFIRE: Ax Inferno T-shirt + guitar pick + autographed CD + download
15 minute Skype call with Paul + EXECUTIVE PRODUCER credit in the CD liner + THE INFERNO BONFIRE: Ax Inferno T-shirt + guitar pick + autographed CD + download (free shipping worldwide)

Are you a musician or singer?  Paul will play guitar on one of your songs (this is usually done via the internet) + EXECUTIVE PRODUCER credit in the CD liner + THE INFERNO BONFIRE: Ax Inferno T-shirt + guitar pick + autographed CD + download (free shipping worldwide)

THE ARDENT STUDIOS INFERNO #1:  (1 available)  You and a friend take a private tour of world famous Ardent Studios in Memphis with Paul!  The live drums for Ax Inferno were recorded there and over the years Ardent has hosted ZZ Top, Stevie Ray Vaughn, Led Zeppelin, Joe Cocker, Jack White, Bob Dylan, Isaac Hayes, and Soundgarden just to name a few.  Lunch with Paul will follow.  Includes EXECUTIVE PRODUCER credit in the CD liner + THE INFERNO BONFIRE: Ax Inferno T-shirt + guitar pick + autographed CD + download + THIS RARITY: a pre-release promo CD from 1993 of Bridge of Dreams with David Lanz. (transportation to Memphis and accomodations not included)

THE ARDENT STUDIOS INFERNO #2: (1 available)  Tour Ardent Studios and have lunch with Paul + EXECUTIVE PRODUCER credit in the CD liner + THE INFERNO BONFIRE: Ax Inferno T-shirt + guitar pick + autographed CD + download + THIS RARITY: a CD longbox (remember those?) release of Paul's second solo album from 1992 Collection 991: Music+Art (still shrinkwrapped!)  (transportation to Memphis and accommodations not included)

THE ARDENT STUDIOS INFERNO #3:  (1 available)  Tour Ardent Studios and have lunch with Paul + EXECUTIVE PRODUCER credit in the CD liner + THE INFERNO BONFIRE: Ax Inferno T-shirt + guitar pick + autographed CD + download + THIS RARITY: a promotional audiocassette of Desert Vision with David Lanz from 1987.  (transportation to Memphis and accommodations not included)

THE ELVIS INFERNO #1:  (1 available)  You and a friend spend the day with Paul in Memphis!  Tour Elvis Presley's home Graceland, the birthplace of rock 'n' roll Sun Studios and have lunch.  Includes EXECUTIVE PRODUCER credit in the CD liner + THE INFERNO BONFIRE: Ax Inferno T-shirt + guitar pick + autographed CD + download + THIS RARITY: a promotional 45 RPM vinyl single of Desert Rain from 1987 (from Desert Vision with David Lanz).  (transportation to Memphis and accommodations not included)

THE ELVIS INFERNO #2:  (1 available)  Tour Graceland and Sun Studios and have lunch with Paul + EXECUTIVE PRODUCER credit in the CD liner + THE INFERNO BONFIRE: Ax Inferno T-shirt + guitar pick + autographed CD + download + THIS RARITY: a promotional audiocassette of Bridge of Dreams with David Lanz from 1993. (transportation to Memphis and accommodations not included)

THE ELVIS INFERNO #3:  (1 available)  Tour Graceland and Sun Studios and have lunch with Paul + EXECUTIVE PRODUCER credit in the CD liner + THE INFERNO BONFIRE: Ax Inferno T-shirt + guitar pick + autographed CD + download + THIS RARITY: an original vinyl copy of Paul's first album Collection 983: Spectral Voyages from 1984.  (transportation to Memphis and accommodations not included)

THE ULTIMATE ATOMIC INFERNO PACKAGE (1 available):
You and a friend spend the entire day with Paul.  Tour Graceland, Sun Studios, have lunch, take a stroll down Beale Street and then back to Paul's home for an Italian dinner prepared by his wife Janice.  While there, you will also hang out in Paul's private recording studio and hear new music he is working on.  Also inlcudes EXECUTIVE PRODUCER credit in the CD liner + THE INFERNO BONFIRE:  Ax Inferno T-shirt + guitar pick + autographed CD + download  (transportation to Memphis and accommodations not included)

PLUS THESE THREE EXTREMELY RARE ITEMS:
1- The original acetate created in 1987 by the Mastering Lab in Hollywood for the Natural States vinyl album which contains the worldwide hit "Behind the Waterfall".  An acetate looks like and plays like a regular LP but it is cut in real time on a lathe in the mastering studio.  There is only one... this is as rare as it gets!
2- The Japanese release of Natural States on audiocassette.  3- One of my original paintings from 1995 "Terra Cotta".

shirt.desc: THE INFERNO BONFIRE: Ax Inferno T-shirt + guitar pick + autographed CD + download.

name:
Happy Shack Mobile Cafe Launch Party!


by
Kim Klein
blurb: Going the distance so you don't have to! Healthy delicious Frozen Yogurt, Gourmet Waffles and so much more!!!

rewards.desc: Thank You for supporting small business! We appreciate your support and to show our love we will give you one Happy Shack glow in the dark armband to display your Comanche FroYo pride
With every donation we grow and in appreciation for your support and encouragement we want to give YOU your first waffle cone of FroYo from the Happy Shack.  Voucher good for local area only
PEACE LOVE FROYO Stadium cup to fill with 12oz of your favorite treat.  Bring it to the Happy Shack and we will sign and fill it up with delicious FroYo!

Thank You! Thank You! Thank You! For all your support and encouragement, for believing in us and wishing to see this dream come true just as much as we do, I know you can almost taste the FroYo and I can see your smile...and that is truly the greatest reward of all! Your first cone is free AND you get a super cool lime green shopping bag with our logo and creed "Peace Love FroYo"
I am so Happy that YOU are making this pledge and are becoming a part of our Happy Shack family!  For your contribution you will receive a custom logo Happy Shack tshirt and a free waffle cone!

Wishes do come true and with your help and encouragement we have made a giant step towards reaching this goal.  We would like to host a party (up to 10 guests) in your honor at your chosen location and time.  We will bring the FroYo to you!  (Within a 50 mile radius of Comanche)

How do we thank thee? Oh let me count the ways...We will bring the FroYo Party (Up to 20 guests) to you*.  Tshirts for every guest and a signed photo with Team Happy Shack! Plus a party pak of goodies that will put a ginormous smile on your face and in your heart as well.  *Within Texas only

shirt.desc: I am so Happy that YOU are making this pledge and are becoming a part of our Happy Shack family!  For your contribution you will receive a custom logo Happy Shack tshirt and a free waffle cone!

name:
Days Without Number - Debut Album!


by
Taylor Stanley
blurb: We're Days Without Number, and we want to share our music with you! Help us record our first album!

rewards.desc: Download of the song you hear in the video - "Times" (This version is exclusive to Kickstarter, and will not be on the album)
Download the full album online when it is released, and a download of "Times"
Hard copy of the album mailed to your doorstep, digital download, and a download of "Times"
T-shirt with album graphic + all of the above
Shout out on the album/website + all of the above
Get the album a week before the release! + all of the above
Moleskin journal with handwritten lyrics of all songs on the album and personal commentary from the band on each song + all of the above
Dinner with the band + all of the above (We can travel, but don't get crazy now)
Song writing session with the band! We'll get together and collaborate on a new song, and we'll give you credit on the ownership! + all of the above

We'll come to your house and play a live show! We'll have the song writing session and dinner beforehand, and we'll play the song live at the show!
+ all of the above
Signed copies of the album & t-shirts for 30 guests at your house show! + all of the above

shirt.desc: T-shirt with album graphic + all of the above
